t=int(raw_input())
for j in xrange(t):
    s=raw_input()
    small=[0 for z in xrange(26)]
    cap=[0 for z in xrange(26)] 
    for i in xrange(len(s)):
        if(ord(s[i])>=65 and ord(s[i])<=90):
            cap[ord(s[i])-65]+=1
        if(ord(s[i])>=97 and ord(s[i])<=122):
            small[ord(s[i])-97]+=1
    cap=filter(lambda a: a != 0, cap)
    small=filter(lambda a: a != 0, small)

    count=0
    for z in xrange(len(cap)):
        if(cap[z]%2==0):
            count+=(cap[z]/2)
        if(cap[z]%2!=0):
            count+=(((cap[z]-1)/2)+1)
    for z in xrange(len(small)):
        if(small[z]%2==0):
            count+=(small[z]/2)
        if(small[z]%2!=0):
            count+=(((small[z]-1)/2)+1)
    print count
